title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.
author: Contributor Content

title: The New Friday Night Lights Reboot Will Never Recapture the Magic of the Original Series
description: Universal is reportedly developing a Friday Night Lights reboot. But the magic of the original series can never be recaptured. The post The New Friday Night Lights Reboot Will Never Recapture the Magic of the Original Series appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: TVLine Items: Never Have I Ever Vet Joins Lanterns, Ioan Gruffudd Sparks With Elsbeth and More
description: Never Have I Ever vet Poorna Jagannathan is entering the world of DC Comics TV with a recurring role in HBO’s upcoming Green Lantern series, our sister site Deadline reports.
